page.title: 12Lesley Mair's Saturday
page.content: I am 13 years old and this is just an ordinary Saturday. I get up at 7.30 am. Papa makes breakfast, while Mum dresses my little brothers. Dad and I milk the cows and feed the animals. We have our breakfast cereal at 8.00 am. Next Dad and I feed the animals in the rough pasture. I love to see the young lambs skipping around having a lot of fun. Sometimes I clean out pens. We have dinner, usually soup, at 12.00 noon. The grown ups often watch TV during dinner but we are not allowed to. After dinner I ride one of the ponies, Dusty or Bambi. Supper is at 5.00 pm. Then I feed the animals, watch TV, and go to bed at 9.30 pm.
